metadata.name: Transport
metadata.description: Erweiterte Playback-Kontrolle: Trimming, Speed, Reverse, Loop-Modi
metadata.author: Flux Art-Net System

parameters.name: position_x
parameters.label: Position X
parameters.description: Horizontale Position (Pixel, negativ = links, positiv = rechts)

parameters.name: position_y
parameters.label: Position Y
parameters.description: Vertikale Position (Pixel, negativ = oben, positiv = unten)

parameters.name: rotation_z
parameters.label: Rotation Z
parameters.description: Rotation um Z-Achse in Grad (2D-Rotation im Uhrzeigersinn)

parameters.name: anchor_x
parameters.label: Anchor X
parameters.description: Ankerpunkt X in Prozent (50% = Mitte, 0% = links, 100% = rechts)

parameters.name: anchor_y
parameters.label: Anchor Y
parameters.description: Ankerpunkt Y in Prozent (50% = Mitte, 0% = oben, 100% = unten)

parameters.name: anchor_z
parameters.label: Anchor Z
parameters.description: Ankerpunkt Z in Prozent (50% = Mitte, beeinflusst 3D-Perspektive)
